scenario.title: Corporate Data Breach - Samba Infiltration
scenario.description: A corporate file server running Samba has been misconfigured, exposing sensitive backup files. The IT department encrypted important data, but poor security practices may have left the keys accessible through network enumeration.
stages: Network discovery and SMB service enumeration
SMB share enumeration and access testing
Credential discovery and cryptographic key recovery
